mapper.insert: insert into ServiceUsage(serviceusage_seq,stock_code1, stock_code2, start_date, end_date, id,report) values(serviceusage_seq.nextval,#{stock_code1},#{stock_code2},#{start_date},#{end_date},#{id},#{report})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ServiceUsage WHERE id = #{id} and report = '두 데이터는 동시에 움직입니다. '
SELECT * FROM ServiceUsage WHERE id = #{id} and report != '두 데이터는 동시에 움직입니다. '
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ServiceUsage su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code1 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code1 = #{stockCode} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
SELECT ad.name FROM ( SELECT ad.name, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ServiceUsage su JOIN AvailableData ad ON su.stock_code2 = ad.stock_code WHERE su.stock_code2 = #{stockCode} ) ad WHERE rn = 1
